trans-unit.source: Contains the service's virtual path when the service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Process Activation Service (WAS).
trans-unit.target: Contém o caminho virtual do serviço quando o serviço é hospedado no Internet Information Services (IIS) ou o serviço de ativação de processos do Windows (WAS).

trans-unit.source: This extension is present only for services hosted in IIS or WAS.
trans-unit.target: Essa extensão está presente somente para serviços hospedados no IIS ou do WAS.

trans-unit.source: Services can determine whether they are hosted in IIS or WAS by retrieving this extension from their <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Services pode determinar se eles estiverem hospedados em IIS ou do WAS recuperando essa extensão de seus <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>, conforme mostrado no exemplo a seguir.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual path of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o caminho virtual do aplicativo IIS ou do WAS que hospeda o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service.

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the service.
trans-unit.target: O caminho virtual do aplicativo IIS ou do WAS que hospeda o serviço.

trans-unit.source: This method is provided to support the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Este método é fornecido para dar suporte a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este método oferece suporte a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser chamado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: This method is provided to support the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Este método é fornecido para dar suporte a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este método oferece suporte a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser chamado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: Gets the site name of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do site do aplicativo IIS ou do WAS que hospeda o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service.

trans-unit.source: The site name of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome do site do IIS ou do WAS aplicativo que hospeda o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual path used by a service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o caminho virtual usado por um serviço.

trans-unit.source: The virtual path used by a service.
trans-unit.target: O caminho virtual usado por um serviço.
